description:
As a demon army besieges his village, a young ninja ventures through a cursed world, to deliver a scroll paramount
to his clan’s survival. What begins as a classic action platformer soon unravels into an expansive time-traveling
adventure full of thrills, surprises, and humor.

0.6.0-RC3-messenger-ut.description:
Enjoy a **The Messenger** apworld, with Universal Tracker compatibility with Portal and Transition shuffle!

It comes with no guaranty and no support. If it breaks, then that's too bad. I might fix it for my next play through.  

I'm not planning to PR it to main unless asked by the world maintainer.
0.6.0-RC3-messenger-ut.title: The Messenger x Universal Tracker - Archipelago 0.6.0-rc3

0.6.3-messenger-ut.description:
# The Messenger with Universal Tracker integration
This alternate version of the The Messenger apworld has integration for portal and transition shuffle with [Universal Tracker](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1367270230635839539).

Compatible with games generated with [Archipelago 0.6.3](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases/tag/0.6.3)

# Installation Instructions (for Windows, but likely compatible with other systems)
- Install Archipelago (link below) with the generator enabled.
- Place the new `messenger.apworld` file in your custom world folder.
- Remove the old `messenger.apworld` file from your `lib/worlds` folder.

# Known Issues
- Seems to not work with Universal tracker 0.2.14? It works with 0.2.13 tho.

# Troubleshooting
- Make sure you removed your `messenger.apworld` from `lib/worlds` and added the new apworld in `custom_worlds`
- Report any issue in the [_#messenger_](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1090822939697500243) channel in the Archipelago discord. Make sure to ping @jouramie otherwise I won't read. 

# We Need Your Help! 
If you'd like to help integrate this into the main Archipelago releases, drop us a [code review](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/pull/5344)! :wink:
Also, please mention in the [_#messenger_](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1090822939697500243) channel that you used it, and report any issue. This will help with the integration process if some player mention using the beta world!
0.6.3-messenger-ut.title: The Messenger x Universal Tracker - Archipelago 0.6.3

0.6.6-messenger-ut.title: The Messenger x Universal Tracker - Archipelago 0.6.6
